T02TD2399E:25b-1: aa tsinta bha ba ti pa ri bh'a ba na n'a ma //
T02TD2399E:25b-3: bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsgom pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD2399E:25b-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2399E:25b-5: bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2399E:25b-6: dgongs pa mdor bsdus rnal 'byor gyi //
T02TD2399E:25b-7: tshad med bzhi yi nyams len ni //
T02TD2399E:25b-8: bsam gyis mi khyab bshad par bya //
T02TD2399E:25b-9: rgyu 'bras stong pa'i rang bzhin la//
T02TD2399E:25b-10: dngos med gzugs dang gnyis med smra //
T02TD2399E:25b-12: dper na 'brug med char bzhin no //
T02TD2399E:25b-13: de phyir rang bzhin bdag med kyi //
T02TD2399E:25b-14: brtul zhugs skal ldan rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD2399E:25b-15: snang zhing srid pa sna tshogs 'di //
T02TD2399E:25b-16: dngos po stong pa bdag med de //
T02TD2399E:25b-17: ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag / de lta bu yi snying rje la //
T02TD2399E:25b-18: sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med //
T02TD2399E:25b-19: mi bsgom mi rtog rang bzhin gsal //
T02TD2399E:25b-20: mtha' dbus bral ba dbu ma'i don //
T02TD2399E:25b-21: de lta'i sems kyi rang bzhin bsgom //
T02TD2399E:25b-22: ma rtogs pa yi sems can la //
T02TD2399E:25b-23: nad 'don snying rje bsgom par bya //
T02TD2399E:25b-24: bdag gi mdun du gang zhig kyang //
T02TD2399E:25b-25: mnyam par bzhag ste mnyam par bsgom //
T02TD2399E:25b-26: de la rnam pa thams cad kyi //
T02TD2399E:25b-28: dgon pa'i snyan rgyud gdams ngag ni //
T02TD2399E:25b-29: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i sku //
T02TD2399E:26a-0: kun gyi sems nyid h'um yig @26a * //
T02TD2399E:26a-2: bdag dang gzhan gyi snying gar bsgom //
T02TD2399E:26a-3: nyi ma'i gdan steng thig ler bsgom //
T02TD2399E:26a-5: nyon mongs thams cad spyang bar bsam //
T02TD2399E:26a-6: de ni gnyis med don yin te //
T02TD2399E:26a-7: lha yi de nyid rang bzhin med //
T02TD2399E:26a-8: de ltar snying rje bsgom byas nas //
T02TD2399E:26a-9: bsam mi khyab pa'i bsam pa ni //
T02TD2399E:26a-10: phan phyir bde ltar bsam par bya //
T02TD2399E:26a-11: rnal 'byor bdag nyid snying ga ru //
T02TD2399E:26a-13: de nas 'od gsal dkar dmar te //
T02TD2399E:26a-14: bar du me lha'i aam yig ni //
T02TD2399E:26a-15: dngos po'i rnal 'byor gang yang med //
T02TD2399E:26a-16: de las ci yang bsam mi khyab //
T02TD2399E:26a-17: gang zhig sgom pa'i rnal 'byor de //
T02TD2399E:26a-19: gsal rig med pa chos sku de //
T02TD2399E:26a-20: de ltar phra ba'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD2399E:26a-21: mngon shes shar te gnyis med rtogs //
T02TD2399E:26a-24: kha cig lha mo bzhi bsgoms nas //
T02TD2399E:26a-25: kha cig dag gi don la brten //
T02TD2399E:26a-26: gnyis med bsgom pa mi shes so //
T02TD2399E:26a-27: zhal nas zhal du brgyud pa yi //
T02TD2399E:26a-28: zhal gdams gzhan la phan phyir ni //
T02TD2399E:26a-29: r'a hu las ni bshad par byas //
T02TD2399E:26a-30: tshad med bzhi bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsgom pa zhes bya ba slob dpon r'a hu las mdzad pa rdzogs so//
